definition[0]: music that is played in the background at the same time as another instrument or singer that plays or sings the main tune
example[0]: He plays folk music with guitar accompaniment.
example[1]: A group of children danced around to the accompaniment of drums and piano.
definition[1]: something that is provided or used with something else
example[2]: White wine makes an excellent accompaniment to fish.
definition[2]: something that happens at the same time as another thing
